name: Stripe
description: Stripe is a comprehensive payment processing platform that enables businesses to accept payments online and in-person. It provides a seamless API for integrating various payment methods, including credit/debit cards, digital wallets, bank transfers, and more.

descriptions.value: Stripe is a comprehensive payment processing platform that enables businesses to accept payments online and in-person. It provides a seamless API for integrating various payment methods, including credit/debit cards, digital wallets, bank transfers, and more.
